name: Kino (Julius Fngis)
description:
KINO

Only one thing stands in the way of human salvation- a tree. It's up to you to get down to the root of things...

CONTROLS:

WASD and Arrows to move (And control Prompts). Spacebar to attack (And to accept prompts/Advance dialogue).

CREDITS:

Isaac Chase: Creative director, programmer 

Nathan Anthony: Creative director, singer, lyricist 

Ciara Hall: Creative director, environmental art, singer 

Stella Kinoshita: Creative director, character art, UI design 

Greyton Manne: Creative director, music and sound, UX design

 Van Johnson: Playtester

Paige Falter: Playtester

Darius Clark: death growls, Playtester

This game was made in one weekend as part of the Global Game Jam. The theme for the game jam was "roots".
